params.listingId: The ID of the listing to close

params.universalProfile_: Address of the Universal Profile contract

params.price: The price in USD with 6 decimals (must be > 0)
params.token: The address of the AccessPass token to list

returns.listingId: The unique ID of the created listing

params.listingId: The ID of the listing to pause/unpause
params.paused: True to pause, false to unpause

params.listingId: The ID of the listing to update
params.newPriceUsd: The new price in USD with 6 decimals (must be > 0)

params.force: Whether to force the transfer even if recipient doesn't implement LSP1

constructor.notice: Constructor sets the Universal Profile address

createListing(address,uint256,uint256).notice: Creates a new listing for an AccessPass token

getListing(uint160).notice: Gets the details of a listing

updatePrice(uint160,uint256).notice: Updates the price of an existing listing

withdrawTokens(uint160,bool).notice: Withdraws all remaining tokens from a listing back to the seller
